abstract: The trend toward radio stations switching to Christmas music ever earlier in the year seems to have abated somewhat, but the first station to make the switch did so this week.
snippet: The trend toward radio stations switching to Christmas music ever earlier in the year seems to have abated somewhat, but the first station to make the switch did so this week.
lead_paragraph: On Wednesday, the radio station KCKC in Kansas City, Mo., became the first station of the year to start playing Christmas music exclusively. Hundreds of other stations will soon follow, if previous years are any guide.

headline.main: Radio Holding Off on Holidays, a Little
headline.print_headline: Radio Holding Off on Holidays, a Little
